title: What roles should the government play in fostering the advancement of the internet of things?
analysis_techniques: Document analysis; Inductive analysis; Content analysis; Focus group
research_description: This article explores the potential roles of the government in fostering the advancement of the Internet of Things (IoT). It identifies policy challenges and opportunities associated with IoT adoption and innovation. Data collected from 177 public comments and a focus group discussion with senior managers is analyzed to derive policy recommendations.
research_results: The study concludes that government policies should adopt a light-touch regulatory approach, promote standards development, address spectrum issues, and advocate for data privacy and security by design to enable IoT advancement.
future_research: Further research could explore how international coordination on IoT policies and standards could enhance global IoT adoption and reduce barriers to innovation.
